about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Federation rank 15 fighter “Jaguar”
  • Active module Artillery barrier drone
  • Special title “Ruthless hunter” — this title is awarded to pilots who relentlessly pursue their enemies, and never retreat or surrender.
  • Special ammunition against aliens — “Resonating crystal”, “Resonating charges”, “Resonating slugs” — 30 pcs.
  • Special missiles “Crystal drone” — 30 pcs.
  • Portrait “3-Jane Marie Ashpoule”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 14 days!

Welcome to the world of science and warfare! “Jaguar” is a unique ship that combines advanced science technologies and combat capabilities. Originally created to study the Aliens in extreme conditions, it was repurposed for military use. The highest efficiency of the ship was confirmed during flight tests, and now it is ready to conquer the expanses of space. Purchase “Jaguar” and get a unique chance to test the power and capabilities of this ship in combat. Don’t miss your chance to enjoy superiority over your opponent and ensure victory for your team!

name: Star Conflict - Jaguar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
